channel.title: Yet another Black Mesa Let's Play!
channel.description:
This is my Black Mesa Let's Play which I did start a while ago but I've been uploading each episode every Wednesday so far.
E01 - Introduction [url]https://youtu.be/j_iH6ekqUgQ[/url]
E02 - The G-Man [url]https://youtu.be/oSVFPLdtO5Q[/url]
E03 - Office Complex [url]https://youtu.be/2zWqaaA6JpE[/url]
Full playlist [url]https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbs566BMtWOrHVmP4lGMKDj2zZFqfTQMx&feature=plcp[/url]
Thanks!

item.title: Yet another Black Mesa Let's Play!
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
We have enough LP’s posted here already.

If we wanted them, there would be a specific thread for you to post them in.
